entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
